name: distributions
schema: CREATE TABLE "distributions" (`description` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `distribution_type` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `documentation_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `github` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `id` TEXT PRIMARY KEY DEFAULT ('r'||lower(hex(randomblob(7)))) NOT NULL, `install_command` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `license` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `name` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `registry` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `registry_url` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `slug` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `status` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `tool` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL, `version` TEXT DEFAULT '' NOT NULL)
